channel.title: FUSS Group @ IITGn – News
channel.description: Recent content in News on FUSS Group @ IITGn

item.title: Prof. Abhishek Bichhawat (jointly with IIT Kharagpur) received ANRF ARG Research Grant
item.description:
We are delighted to share that Prof. Abhishek Bichhawat, in collaboration with Prof. Mainack Mondal from IIT Kharagpur, has been awarded the ANRF ARG Research Grant for their proposal on designing a usable and privacy-compliant consent management framework for online browsing.

Read more about the award on Prof. Mainack Mondal’s LinkedIn post: https://www.linkedin.com/posts/mainack-mondal-73a1427_anrf-arg-anrf-activity-7408063928557023232-4jVN

item.title: Gayatri got the Google PhD Fellowship 2025!
item.description:
We are thrilled to announce that Gayatri Priyadarsini Kancherla has been awarded the Google PhD Fellowship 2025 in the area of Privacy, Safety, and Security. Congratulations to Gayatri for this prestigious recognition!

For more details, visit: https://research.google/programs-and-events/phd-fellowship/recipients/

item.title: Gayatri presented her work at PETS 2025
item.description: We are delighted to announce that Gayatri’s work “Johnny can’t revoke consent either: measuring compliance of consent revocation on the web” has been published at the Privacy Enhancing Technologies Symposium 2025.

item.title: Gayatri's Work Accepted at WWW 2025
item.description: We are delighted to announce that Gayatri’s work “Least Privilege Access for Persistent Storage Mechanisms in Web Browsers” has been published at the Web Conference 2025.

item.title: Google India Research Award 2024 goes to Prof. Abhishek Bichhawat!
item.description: We are thrilled to announce that Prof. Abhishek Bichhawat has been awarded the Google India Research Award 2024 primarily for the work “Towards a Secure and Private Web Browsing Experience”. Kudos to the team!
